name: Card #1
text: Instead of attacking, roll a die. Deal 10 damage on a 5 or 6, and 0 damage otherwise

name: Card #3
text: Before attacking, roll a die. On a 6, take no damage this turn

name: Card #4
text: If the power die of this card changes, add 1 to toughness

name: Card #7
text: Immediately after initial rolls, double this card's power and toughness if they match. Halve them each otherwise

name: Card #10
text: Before attacking, roll a die. Kill any opponent's cards that have power matching that number

name: Card #11
text: After initial die rolls, add 1d6/2 to toughness of creature ahead

name: Card #12
text: On death, card behind gets 1d6/2 additional power

name: Card #13
text: Before creature ahead attacks, reroll its power die if it is <= 3

name: Card #14
text: When an ally is killed, add 1d6-2 to this card's toughness

name: Card #15
text: Cards killed by this do not activate 'on death' mechanics

name: Card #16
text: Before the card ahead attacks, reroll its power

name: Card #17
text: Before card ahead attacks, reroll its toughness

name: Card #18
text: Before this creature attacks, reroll its power die

name: Card #19
text: On death, add 1 power to your other cards

name: Card #20
text: On death, add 1 toughness to your other creatures

name: Card #21
text: After initial die rolls, reroll any 1s on any of your creatures as a 1d6 roll

name: Card #22
text: After receiving damage, add 1d6-2 to power

name: Card #23
text: After initial die rolls, if your power or toughness are even, roll another die and add to it. Repeat until both are odd

name: Card #24
text: Before attacking, roll a die. On an even roll, take no damage this round

name: Card #25
text: On death, spawn another 1d6/1d6 with no type or text on the spot where this creature died

name: Card #26
text: Before attacking, deal 1 damage to each of your own cards, including this

name: Card #27
text: After initial die rolls, remove all dice on this card which match
